attributes.action: greatly improve the public transport system of Greater Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government wants more people to use public transport, this is happening, but unfortunately they are not providing nearly enough buses or routes, not to mention the constant price increases. I agree with the decision to allow pensioners free travel but why should the rest of us suffer?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
